moves.1... e5 2. Nf3: Thought I might play a little aggressive.
moves.4. d4 exd4 5. Nxd4: I don't think he saw the pin, or else Bd7 may have come earlier.
moves.5... Bd7 6. Bc4 Nxd4 7. Qxd4 Nf6: I'll trade a pawn to check.
Now that the middle game is here (it may have been here before) you can see that it is quite an open game.
moves.11... Re8 12. Qg3 Bd6 13. Bf4 Bxf4 14. Q: I need his Bishop pair gone.
moves.14... Nh5 15. Bxf7+: I thought about doing it with my Queen, but I decided against it.
moves.19... g6 20. Bg4 Re8 21. Be6+ Kf8 22. Qf:
Here my opponent disconnected, but I do not think that it was by accident.
Thanks for watching, please rate and comment.

opening: Ruy Lopez (C62), old Steinitz defence, Nimzovich attack
